paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val122Ile, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: clinical signs and symptoms of heart failure, echocardiography showed a thick left ventricular wall
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient displayed clinical signs and symptoms of heart failure and echocardiography showed a thick left ventricular wall.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile mutation is associated with hereditary amyloidosis, causing severe cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: No mutations were noted in the patient's son.
variants.population_frequency: 3.9% in the African-American population; rare in Asian populations.
variants.additional_notes: This is the second reported case of the ATTR Val122Ile variant in Japan.
key_quotes: ATTR Val122Ile is one of the mutations in TTR that are associated with hereditary amyloidosis, causing severe cardiomyopathy.
This is the second reported case of the ATTR Val122Ile variant in Japan.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant Val122Ile was successfully extracted.
